defaultDimensionValue.description: The default value of the dimension that is published to Amazon CloudWatch if you don't provide the value of the dimension when you send an email.

dimensionName.description: The name of an Amazon CloudWatch dimension associated with an email sending metric.

dimensionValueSource.description: The location where the Amazon SES API v2 finds the value of a dimension to publish to Amazon CloudWatch. Valid values: `MESSAGE_TAG`, `EMAIL_HEADER`, `LINK_TAG`.
